name: opnform
description: OpnForm is an open-source, Airtable-like form builder that allows users to create, share, and collect responses with an integrated UI. It supports REST APIs and can be self-hosted for full data control.
features: Form Builder: Drag-and-drop form creation with multiple field types, validation rules, and conditional logic.
Response Management: Collect, view, and export form responses with filtering, sorting, and analytics capabilities.
Custom Styling: Apply custom themes, colors, and branding to forms for professional appearance and consistency.
Logic Branching: Create dynamic forms with conditional fields and multi-step workflows based on user responses.
File Uploads: Support file attachments with size limits, type restrictions, and secure storage management.
Email Notifications: Automated email alerts for form submissions with customizable templates and recipient lists.
API Integration: REST API access for programmatic form creation, response retrieval, and system integration.
Data Export: Export responses to CSV, Excel, and other formats for analysis and reporting purposes.
Collaboration Tools: Share forms with team members and manage permissions for editing and viewing access.
Embed Options: Embed forms in websites, blogs, and applications with customizable iframe and JavaScript options.
Response Validation: Real-time form validation with custom error messages and data quality controls.
Analytics Dashboard: View submission statistics, completion rates, and user engagement metrics with visual charts.
